title: As Midterms Near, Biden Faces a Nation as Polarized as Ever
description: President Biden had hoped to preside over a moment of reconciliation after the turmoil of the Trump years. But the fever of polarizing politics has not broken ahead of Tuesdayâ€™s midterm elections.
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden speaking during a rally in Albuquerque on Thursday.
